content:
SourceLevels Enum

Definition

Specifies the levels of trace messages filtered by the source switch and event type filter.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum SourceLevels
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
SourceLevels
Attributes
FlagsAttribute

Remarks

The source levels identify the TraceEventType events that are to be traced. The SourceSwitch class uses the SourceLevels enumeration to define the event level of the trace message to use for filtering messages to send to the trace listener.

The EventTypeFilter class uses the SourceLevels enumeration to determine whether a trace listener should emit a trace.

Fields

ActivityTracing

Allows the stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Stop, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Start, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Suspend, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Transfer, and stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Resume events through.
All

Allows all events through.
Critical

Allows only stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical events through.
Error

Allows stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical and stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error events through.
Information

Allows stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Warning, and stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Information events through.
Off

Does not allow any events through.
Verbose

Allows stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Warning, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Information, and stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Verbose events through.
Warning

Allows stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Critical, stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Error, and stem.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Warning events through.
